prize.heading: Prize fund
prize.title: As well as:
prize.itemText1: The best participants will be considered for 5 and more vacancies.
prize.itemText2: Following the event, the list of the most striking projects will be submitted to the Investment Council for grant and investment support consideration.

about.heading: About Hackathon
about.text1: Registration will be open from 14.06 to 24.06 Applications are accepted both from teams and individual participants.
about.text2: Online Hackathon is designed for developers from all over Kazakhstan. Point offices for offline participation will be provided for residents of the cities of Nur-Sultan and Almaty.
about.text3: On June 28, there will be an announcement of winners on the live broadcast. As a result of the hackathon, developers who have submitted the best solutions will be offered employment at JAS Nur-Sultan (there are 5 and  more open vacancies)! In addition to that, the most striking projects will be submitted to the investment council for grant and investment support consideration.

task.heading: Task
task.title: Opensea style marketplace creation:
task.text2: Smart Contract Generator for ERC20 Token

program.heading: Hackathon program
program.text1: Greetings from the event organizers. Educational workshops.
program.text2: Time to develop a solution to the problem.
program.text3: Participants present their solutions and are interviewed by representatives of JAS Nur-Sultan.

organizers.heading: Organizers
organizers.text1: Seedstars is a Swiss group of companies working in the field of startups in emerging markets with the goal of improving people's lives through technology and entrepreneurship development, connecting stakeholders and investing in high-performing startups.
organizers.text2:
JAS Nur-Sultan is a young venture and investment company registered in the jurisdiction of the Astana International Financial Center (AIFC), and is also a member of the Nazarbayev University ecosystem.
The main activity of the company is to proactively search for startups through networking and various incubation and acceleration programs in Kazakhstan with the subsequent financing of promising, scalable and fast-growing startups.
